dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Hello, adventurer! What brings you to this town?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Excellent! We could use someone like you. I have a task that needs to be done.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Well, if you need anything, just let me know.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: There's a dragon causing trouble on the outskirts of town. We need someone to defeat it.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: You've already defeated the dragon. Is there anything else I can help you with?
